Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with ILC in 2009. I am trying to move on with life, but unfortunately, I am having problems with breast reconstruction. I do not want to shock women but tell them that things can be done right. [Edited by admin] I had four Breast Reconstructions, all went wrong, and I was discharged without explanation. [Edited by admin] Please, watch the video and then share it. Thank you. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4wMbkqGN__o >>> BBC News Broadcast
Posts.Title: My story was on BBC News. Please, I need your support!
